channel.title: 317 adding objects
channel.description: i am currently using the server waleed scape and i am trying to look for the makeGlobal thing that is on all of the tutorials to add objects into a server but its just not any where i have searched the whole server folder.... can any one help?

item.title: 317 adding objects
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

naughty jef:

I could not find anything under ::object or ::Object

EDIT:
search for:

loadObjects

then look below it, it should say CreateObject like this:

CreateObject(3216, 2781, 2781, 0);

Read full topic

item.title: 317 adding objects
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_Pk Ivycial
item.description:
@Bandos_Pk wrote:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
		for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
			if(p != null){
				client person = (client)p;
			if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){
				if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
					person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}}

Read full topic
